properties.areaDesc: Richland, SC; Calhoun, SC; Lexington, SC
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 12:41PM EST until February 25 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Columbia SC
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South
Carolina...

Wateree River At Lake Wateree affecting Fairfield...Kershaw and
Lancaster Counties

Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun...Lexington
and Richland Counties

Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting
Calhoun and Richland Counties

North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County


.Runoff along with additional releases from upstream reservoirs will
result in high levels and minor flooding on some area basins through
early next week.

The Flood Warning is extended for
The Congaree River At Carolina Eastman.
* from Friday evening to Monday evening, or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 12 PM Thursday the stage was 112.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 115 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Friday night,
and crest around 116.1 feet Sunday morning.
The river will fall below flood stage by Monday evening.
* At 115 feet...Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina
Eastman Facility, and at the Congaree National Park.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The
water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to
play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to noaa weather radio...
local media or the internet for further statements and updated
forecasts.
